abstract: The most basic task is to restore a sense of fairness to and faith in our economic system — much as Franklin D. Roosevelt did in the 1930s.
snippet: The most basic task is to restore a sense of fairness to and faith in our economic system — much as Franklin D. Roosevelt did in the 1930s.
lead_paragraph: AMONG the daunting set of tasks ahead for the president-elect, perhaps the most basic is to restore a sense of fairness to and faith in our economic system  much as Franklin D. Roosevelt did in the 1930s.

headline.main: Remember That Capitalism Is More Than a Spectator Sport
headline.print_headline: Remember That Capitalism Is More Than a Spectator Sport
